traits.name: Charger
traits.detail: If you moved more than 20ft in a straight line towards your target, make your melee attack roll with advantage. On a hit, you knock your target prone in addition to any other effect.

traits.name: (Scout) Pincer Movement
traits.detail: When an ally moves adjacent to an enemy, you can spend your reaction to move up to your speed towards that same enemy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Agreus makes two attacks: one with his Hooves and one with his Storm Pike, or two with his Longbow.

actions.name: Storm Pike
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 12 (1d10+7) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.detail: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 10 (1d8+6) piercing damage.

reactions.name: I Saw That Coming
reactions.detail: When an ally would be hit by an attack, you can spend your reaction to grant that ally +5 AC against the attack.
